title: Murder, Madness, and Eric XIV
itunes:title: Murder, Madness, and Eric XIV
description:
Throughout history, there have been stories of royals going mad. But very few kings have committed murder in their fits of insanity.


Support Noble Blood:

— Bonus episodes and scripts on Patreon

— Merch!

— Pre-order Dana's book, Anatomy: A Love Story

— Sign up to join Dana on the Mary Shelley Pilgrimage in April

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
